title: African saga: A brief introduction to African history
description: The fact is now generally accepted that Africa was the birthplace and original home of the human race. However, until very recently it was assumed and perpetuated through histories that the only history of Africa is that of the white man in Africa. Here is a chance to read in popular style the fascinating African story as seen through the eyes and viewpoints of a distinguished black historian.
author: Stanlake Samkange
